subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks’ Jason Kidd, who turns 40 Saturday, is not as durable as he was 15 years ago, but he continues to make a difference. Will the pressure take a toll on him or will he get a second wind?
snippet: Knicks’ Jason Kidd, who turns 40 Saturday, is not as durable as he was 15 years ago, but he continues to make a difference. Will the pressure take a toll on him or will he get a second wind?
